item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: For me it is 21% now, it can be any number as far I see:) If sci2 works with 3rd effect, then even 100% :D It depends on "Current Upkeep: 79%", paperwork helps with taxes, but not with credits transfer. Look at your village page and upgrade list for more details :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Credit converts to Village Ryo at a rate dependent on your current Village's current Upkeep. So, generally it'll vary from Village to Village and day-to-day.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Can someone post that credit converts to village ryo at a 9% rate on mine

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
ehm, how do i put thisâ€¦

ITs like the marketplace has its personal record of you. Just because you jump from village to village, and from season to seaon, doesn't mean the marketplace goes with you. Items once listed that expire get sent to you, while ryo becomes marketplace ryo. All marketplace ryo will be held at the marketplace until ou find an opportunity to extract it. It CANNOT be touched until the village you are in aquires the marketplace upgrade.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Also needed to know: Does marketplace money loop?

item.title: Leaving village
item.content:encoded:
Since to visit the marketplace you have to be in a village, what happens to your listed items, money and so on when you leave one?
You lose them?
You don't lose them but get the items back and maybe you cannot pull the ryo until you join another village?
I'm really interested, please answer.

I also need to know what happens to autobuys when you leave a village.
